amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the "Department of Interior, Bureau of Land Management, Management of Lands and Resources" (Wild Horse and Burro Management Program) by $2 million and applies the amount to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 30 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for the "Department of Interior, Bureau of Land Management, Management of Lands and Resources" by $2 million and apply the amount to the deficit reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton (IN) amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
